basic.description:
An examination of design elements in theatrical production, exploring the work of design practitioners and theorists, and studying the design process.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Design and Theatre

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in DRAM240 or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    DRAM200.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM240; DRAM242; DRAM245
